metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25950 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: HTTP request/response smuggling vulnerability in HAProxy version 2.7.0, and 2.6.1 to 2.6.7 allows a remote attacker to alter a legitimate user's request. As a result, the attacker may obtain sensitive information or cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

criterions.comment: haproxy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
